commitResults.messageBody: Refactored chatbot name to Pep and implemented skeletal version
Program now waits for user input, will echo the input unless receives "bye", where it then exists.
All UI logic is in Ui class, and improved readability with Pep focusing on chatbot behavior while UI handles presentation.
Add the ability to store whatever text entered by the user and display them back to the user when requested.
Add the ability to mark tasks as done. Optionally, add the ability to change the status back to not done.

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: split Pep into separate classes
commitResults.messageBody: - Moved Ui, TaskList, and Task into their own files for better modularity

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: improve task output formatting in toString()
commitResults.messageBody:
Replaced direct System.out.println usage with a cleaner toString() override
that formats tasks consistently using status icon and description.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: add support for Todo, Deadline task types
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implemented Task subclasses (Todo, Deadline) inheriting from Task
- Updated Pep to parse commands for each task type and store them polymorphically
- Enhanced UI to display task type, status, and relevant date details

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: add Event task type with start and end time support
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implemented Event class extending Task to represent tasks with a start and end time
- Updated command parsing in Pep to handle 'event' input with /from and /to parameters
- Enhanced UI to display Event tasks with their time range
